segments.text: I was wondering if someone in your office could help me with a question I have about my payment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would be happy to answer any questions you might have .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My paycheck seems to be smaller than the one I received last week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about income ? Did you make any money during that period ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My old employer gave us a couple days of work during that period .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When you filled out your Continued Claim Form , did you show that income ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course I wrote down the work that I had done on the Continued Claim Form .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What happens is , when you make money , we take part of your benefits away .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am not going to show any income from now on then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wouldn â€™ t do that if I were you . There is a severe penalty if you get caught making false statements .
segments.speaker: S2
